short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool useful for web developers who frequently switch between testing environments and production sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dev Prod URL is a Chrome extension designed to streamline the development process by providing seamless redirection between development (dev) and production (prod) URLs. This tool is particularly useful for developers who frequently switch between testing environments and production sites.
